It had been a long and hard day for fairy tail only celestial wizard Lucy Hearfilla. Not only did she today take on a pack of monster but also thanks to her destructive team mates somehow ended up replanting an entire forest as well helping the local village café to pay back the buildings they destroyed.

"Man sometime I think we've more destructive then the monsters we fight." Lucy thought to herself as she slowly walked along side the cannel near her home. The boat men warn her like they always do to be careful causing Lucy to call back she will before heading home. Her body ache and her eyes nearly closing on themselves, Lucy decide she could only do one thing to make herself feel better. Have a nice, hot bubble filled bath.

To the blonde nothing sounding more relaxing them laying in the tub surrounded by bubbles and the warmth of the water rushing through her body. And even thinking about it made her pick up her pace until finally she arrives at her home. Lucy quickly open up her door, then lock it behind her before throwing her bag onto her cream sofa and racing to the bathroom. She could not wait and as the water ran, she quickly undresses herself telling herself after she was done she would simple change in her bedroom. The celestial wizard throws her clothes outside the bathroom door with the excuse she'll pick them up later before finally settling down into her bath.

The water rushed over her skin like a waterfall and Lucy could feel a warm feeling begin to slowly rise over her body.

"Ah this is just what I need. Peace and quiet with no one to bother me."

In fact Lucy felt so relax that she started to close her eyes before finally thanks to her body feeling all lose and warm she drift to sleep with her bed resting on the back of the bath. Luckily Lucy bath was a little to small for her meaning she would not slip into the water as her feet held her up. However little did she know that as she slept someone or something came into her house through an open window. They looked around before quickly scooping up Lucy's clothes from outside the bathroom before removing every towel from the house and barricading the door to her bedroom where Lucy kept all her clothes.

But who or what did this trick?
